item.title: Meta 董事会成员鲍威尔-麦考密克在八个月后辞职
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的前高级顾问迪娜-鲍威尔-麦考密克（Dina Powell McCormick）在加入 Meta Platforms 公司仅八个月后，即将从董事会卸任。【原文：Dina Powell McCormick, a former top adviser to President Donald Trump, is stepping down from the board of Meta Platforms Inc. just eight months after she joined.】

item.title: Invesco 现在终于不再给您打电话询问 QQQ 投票事宜了
item.description: 对于资产管理公司来说，第三次就是魅力所在【原文：For the asset manager, third time’s the charm】

item.title: 金门公司寻求获得 18 亿美元的交易，该交易得到 Ardian 和 Apollo 的支持
item.description: Golden Gate Capital 正在向包括 Ardian、Neuberger Berman 和阿波罗全球管理公司 S3 在内的投资者募集约 18 亿美元，这笔交易将使部分投资者从其常青基金中套现。【原文：Golden Gate Capital is raising about $1.8 billion from investors including Ardian, Neuberger Berman and Apollo Global Management’s S3 in a deal that will let some investors cash out of its evergreen fund.】

item.title: 巴西批准 2026 年预算，将使其财政规则捉襟见肘
item.description: 巴西立法者批准了路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦总统任期内的最后一份预算，支持一项最终将证明政府遵守三年前制定的财政规则有多么困难的计划。【原文：Brazilian lawmakers approved the final budget of President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s term, backing a plan that will ultimately demonstrate just how hard it is for the government to comply with fiscal rules it created three years ago.】

item.title: 石油公司债券因重组报告跌至两年低点
item.description: 有报道称，秘鲁正在权衡对陷入困境的国有企业申请破产，秘鲁石油公司（Petroleos del Peru SA）的债券周五大跌。【原文：Bonds of Petroleos del Peru SA plunged on Friday following reports that Peru is weighing filing for bankruptcy of the struggling state-owned company.】

item.title: 芝加哥市议会通过不征收人头税的税收条例
item.description: 芝加哥市议会周五批准了 2026 年收入条例，该条例是美国第三大城市约 160 亿美元预算的重要组成部分。【原文：Chicago’s city council on Friday approved a revenue ordinance for 2026 that’s a key component of a roughly $16 billion budget for the third-largest US city.】

item.title: Dynamite 首席执行官就移民问题抨击魁北克省长勒高特
item.description: 快速时尚零售商 Groupe Dynamite Inc. 的负责人猛烈抨击了魁北克省省长弗朗索瓦-勒戈尔（Francois Legault），并再次威胁说，如果省政府不放宽其限制性移民政策，该公司的总部就将搬迁。【原文：The head of fast-fashion retailer Groupe Dynamite Inc. sharply criticized Quebec Premier Francois Legault, threatening again to move the company’s headquarters if the provincial government doesn’t relax its restrictive immigration policies.】

item.title: 格拉西顺利接管陷入困境的阿根廷大豆巨头
item.description: 阿根廷最大的谷物经纪公司之一 Grassi SA 扫清了接管陷入困境的出口商 Vicentin SAIC 的最后障碍，Vicentin SAIC 的资产包括世界上最大的大豆压榨厂的大量股份。【原文：Grassi SA, one of Argentina’s top grain brokerages, cleared what could be the last hurdle to take over distressed exporter Vicentin SAIC, whose assets include a significant stake in the world’s biggest soybean crushing plant.】

item.title: Fatburger 老板面临掩盖流动性紧缩的指控
item.description: FAT Brands 公司的一位股东正在起诉这家餐饮连锁店的所有者，指控其在财务前景日益暗淡、股价本周创下多年新低的情况下隐瞒了债务的真实情况。【原文：One of FAT Brands Inc.’s shareholders is suing the restaurant-chain owner for allegedly hiding the true extent of its debt amid a darkening financial outlook that saw its stock hit a multiyear low this week.】

item.title: 纽约提供 3 亿美元支持海上风电项目
item.description: 纽约将提供 3 亿美元用于改善港口，以示对受到特朗普政府打击的海上风电产业的支持。【原文：New York is offering $300 million for port improvements in a signal of support for an offshore wind industry that’s been battered by the Trump administration.】

item.title: 特朗普为毕业生债务设定上限，耶鲁大学和宾夕法尼亚大学准备学生贷款方案
item.description: 耶鲁大学正在创建一个新项目，为研究生和专业学生提供学生贷款，因为政府正在限制他们通过联邦贷款项目可借贷的金额。【原文：Yale University is creating a new program to offer student loans to graduate and professional students, now that the government is limiting the amount they can borrow though the federal lending program.】

item.title: TikTok 交易如何解决其美国业务的争议
item.description: 关于 TikTok 美国业务未来的长达数年之久的争论终于可能接近尾声。该社交媒体平台称，其美国分公司将被甲骨文公司牵头的财团收购，这与特朗普政府 9 月份提出的交易一致。【原文：The yearslong saga over the future of TikTok’s American operations could finally be nearing a conclusion. The social media platform says its US arm is being bought by a consortium led by Oracle Corp., aligning with the deal outlined by the Trump administration in September.】

item.title: Singer's Elliott 赢得裁决，迫使 PE 公司清盘基金
item.description: 保罗-辛格（Paul Singer）的埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management Inc.【原文：Paul Singer’s Elliott Investment Management Inc. convinced a judge to grant its request to liquidate an oil and gas fund as part of a legal fight with a Texas private equity firm managing the assets.】

item.title: 前迪斯尼战略家梅耶认为派拉蒙将战胜华纳兄弟
item.description: 迪斯尼公司前首席战略官凯文-梅耶预测派拉蒙天舞公司将提高对华纳兄弟发现公司的出价，并最终赢得这场备受瞩目的收购战。【原文：Kevin Mayer, former chief strategy officer at Walt Disney Co., predicted Paramount Skydance Corp. will raise its bid for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. and ultimately win the high-profile takeover battle.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）授予两名举报人超过 180 万美元的奖励
item.description: 两名举报人因提供信息帮助解决了涉及受骗投资者的案件而获得商品期货交易委员会超过 180 万美元的奖励。【原文：Two whistleblowers were awarded more than $1.8 million by the Commodity Futures Trading Commission for information that helped resolve cases involving defrauded investors.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚将关键利率维持在 9.25% 的分歧决定
item.description: 哥伦比亚维持利率不变，因为坚挺的比索有助于抑制通胀压力。【原文：Colombia left interest rates unchanged as the strong peso helps keep a lid on inflationary pressure.】

item.title: 沙特石油销售将在新年激增，表明供应量不断增加
item.description: 随着 2026 年的到来，世界上最大的原油出口国沙特阿拉伯的原油销售量将激增，从美国到亚洲的客户都将获得更多的供应，因为人们对石油供应过剩的担忧与日俱增。【原文：Crude oil sales from the world’s biggest exporter, Saudi Arabia, are set to surge as 2026 begins, with customers from the US to Asia all set to receive more supply amid growing concerns over an oil glut.】

item.title: 加蓬在国际货币基金组织（IMF）谈判之际开始改革，将对采矿交易进行审计
item.description: 加蓬将启动对采矿合同的审计工作，在与国际货币基金组织商谈新贷款计划的同时寻求加强管理。【原文：Gabon will kick off an audit of mining contracts as it seeks to strengthen governance amid talks with the International Monetary Fund for a new lending program.】

item.title: 据说 SumU 顾问将引导公司远离美国这个可能的 IPO 上市地点
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，为欧洲金融技术公司SumUp Payments Ltd.提供咨询的公司建议该公司在当地而不是美国进行首次公开募股。【原文：Firms advising European financial technology company SumUp Payments Ltd. recommended it holds an initial public offering locally instead of in the US, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 小公司带来的大惊喜
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 加拿大银行政策总监离职，转任副财长一职
item.description: 尼克-莱斯维克（Nick Leswick）自 2024 年开始担任加拿大银行政策执行董事，他将重返财政部担任副部长。【原文：Nick Leswick, who has served as the executive director of policy at the Bank of Canada since the start of 2024, is returning to the Department of Finance as deputy minister.】

item.title: 金鹅运动鞋被 Permira 出售给中国公司 HSG
item.description: 售价 500 美元的意大利旧运动鞋制造商金鹅（Golden Goose）将拥有一位中国老板。【原文：Golden Goose, the Italian maker of $500 distressed sneakers, is getting a Chinese owner.】

item.title: 三色公司为即将拍卖的车辆支付了 1.25 亿美元
item.description: 破产的次级汽车贷款公司 Tricolor Holdings 赢得了法院许可，可以对该公司在今年早些时候倒闭前以 1.25 亿美元收购的约 9500 辆汽车进行拍卖。【原文：Bankrupt subprime auto lender Tricolor Holdings won court permission to hold an auction for about 9,500 vehicles that it acquired for $125 million before the company collapsed earlier this year.】

item.title: 秘鲁航空公司因新转机费而取消国际航线
item.description: 由于新的转机费，从秘鲁最大机场起飞的航空公司正在取消国际航线，这进一步损害了首都利马最近完工的航站楼的顺利投产。【原文：Airlines operating out of Peru’s largest airport are canceling international routes because of a new transfer fee, further tarnishing the botched rollout of a recently completed terminal in the capital, Lima.】

item.title: 海外投资者购买 60 亿美元哥伦比亚比索债券，创历史新高
item.description: 周五，一家海外基金通过与政府直接谈判，购买了约 60 亿美元的哥伦比亚地方债券。【原文：An offshore fund is buying about $6 billion of Colombian local bonds on Friday through a direct negotiation with the government.】

item.title: 暴雪总裁谈文化、奖金和发布更多游戏
item.description: 约翰娜-法尔斯（Johanna Faries）于 2024 年接任暴雪总裁一职，她透露了这家历史悠久的工作室的未来发展。【原文：Johanna Faries, who took over as president of Blizzard in 2024, reveals what’s coming from the storied studio】

item.title: 股东和贷款人要求解决 Raízen 债务问题
item.description: 巴西陷入困境的蔗糖和乙醇公司 Raízen SA 正在加大力度支撑其资产负债表，在该公司的美元债券暴跌之后，股东谈判变得更加紧迫。【原文：Raízen SA, Brazil’s struggling sugar and ethanol company, is stepping up efforts to shore up its balance sheet, with shareholder talks gaining urgency after the company’s dollar bonds tumbled.】

item.title: 艾略特为 Altice International 的控股公司贷款进行再融资
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，Altice International 的一家控股公司从 Elliott Investment Management 获得了资金，用于为超过 5 亿欧元（5.86 亿美元）的债务进行再融资，这是 Patrick Drahi 的电信企业集团为理清一大堆债务所做的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：A holding company of Altice International obtained funds from Elliott Investment Management to refinance more than €500 million ($586 million) of debt, as part of a broader effort by Patrick Drahi’s telecommunications conglomerate to sort out its pile of liabilities, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 伯恩斯坦称英伟达对芯片指数的折让处于历史水平
item.description: 伯恩斯坦认为，Nvidia Corp. 相对于费城证券交易所半导体指数的估值很少如此具有吸引力，而这一倍数总体上预示着未来回报的良好前景。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s valuation relative to the Philadelphia Stock Exchange Semiconductor Index has rarely been so attractive, and the multiple overall augurs well for future returns, according to Bernstein.】

item.title: 私人信用评级面临全球监管机构的新一轮审查
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士告诉彭博新闻社，私人信贷行业正面临着全球最高监管机构对这一价值 1.7 万亿美元的市场上的一些债务评级所进行的新一轮审查。【原文：The private credit industry is facing fresh scrutiny from top global regulators over some of the ratings being assigned to debt in the $1.7 trillion market, people familiar with the matter told Bloomberg News.】
